content: knitted top with round yoke in drops muskat the piece is worked top down with leaf pattern and lace pattern drops design pattern no r-764 **sizes** s - m - l - xl - xxl - xxxl **materials** drops muskat from garnstudio belongs to yarn group b 400-400-450-500-550-600 g colour 82 silver fox **knitting gauge ** 21 stitches and 28 row in stocking stitch = 10 x 10 cm needles drops double pointed needles size 4 mm drops circular needle size 4 mm length 40 cm and 80 cm for stocking stitch drops double pointed needles size 3 mm drops circular needle size 3 mm length 40 cm and 80 cm for rib
